tool_description: Creates backup copies of journal entries in multiple formats with compression and integrity verification.

entries_to_backup.description: Array of formatted journal entries to backup

backup_format.description: Backup format: json, xml, csv, plain_text

compression.description: Whether to compress the backup file

backup_name.description: Custom name for the backup file

error_messages: No entries provided: Supply at least one journal entry for backup.
Invalid backup format: Use one of [json, xml, csv, plain_text].
Too many entries: Maximum 10000 entries can be backed up in a single operation.
Backup creation failed: Unable to create backup file from provided entries.
usage: Provide entries_to_backup array and select backup_format. Enable compression and checksums for data integrity. Optionally set custom backup_name. Returns backup file information and verification details.

backup_filename.description: Name of the created backup file

backup_size.description: Size of the backup file in bytes

entries_backed_up.description: Number of entries included in the backup

checksum.description: Integrity checksum of the backup file
